source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_00<tab>Y'mhitra has the most fascinating news for you.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_00<tab>アプカル滝のヤ・ミトラのもとに、とある報せが届けられたようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_01<tab>Y'mhitra has had word from Saint Coinach's Find that the archaeologists have unearthed an Allagan tome on summoning magicks. Make your way to the camp in Mor Dhona and speak with Rammbroes.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_01<tab>前回までの冒険録：
聖コイナク財団のヤ・ミトラとともに、古代アラグの召喚魔法を現代に甦らせた冒険者。冒険者は黒い召喚士トリスタンを倒すが、今度はその兄が現れ、蛮神召喚を試みようとする。ヤ・ミトラと冒険者は、兄弟の戦友であったダンシング・ウルフ大闘士とともに彼を追い、背後で暗躍する四助祭のアシエンの存在をつきとめた。そして黒幕であるアシエンと対決し、これを葬り去ったのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
古代アラグの遺跡から、召喚魔法の書物が出土したという。モードゥナの聖コイナク財団の調査地にいる「ラムブルース」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_02<tab>Rammbroes immediately places the ancient book in your hands, declaring that he was able to decipher little more than the fact that it contained the wisdom of Allagan summoners. He bids you take the tome to Y'mhitra in Revenant's Toll, and allow the scholar to peruse its pages.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_02<tab>ラムブルースと話した。レヴナンツトールのヤ・ミトラに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D6001 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_03<tab>Y'mhitra carefully cracks open the tome's covers, and the both of you are caught off guard as the book suddenly jumps from her hands and introduces itself as “Principia.” According to the animate familiar, it was created as an instruction manual for promising summoners, but can only share its higher knowledge once the student in question has completed three formidable challenges. The first of these challenges is to be a test of power. Follow Y'mhitra out into the wilds of north Silvertear, and ask Principia to call forth your monstrous opponent.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_03<tab>突然、アラグの書物が口を開き、「プリンキピア」と名乗った。プリンキピアは3つの試練を越えた者に、召喚魔法の秘法を授けるという。第一の試練は「力」の試練。戦いの準備を整えて、モードゥナの銀泪湖北岸にいる「プリンキピア」と話し、現れた敵を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_04<tab>You have defeated the demon of the tome. Share your victory with the nearby Y'mhitra.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_04<tab>第一の試練を乗り越えた。銀泪湖北岸の「ヤ・ミトラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_05<tab>It appears your victory over the tome's demon was more than satisfactory, but despite its glowing praise, “Prin” gives the impression that your technique is far from perfect. Amazed at this evaluation and intrigued by the tale of the familiar's creation, Y'mhitra seems lost in contemplation of the past. Return to Gridania, and rejoin the scholar at Apkallu Falls.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_05<tab>ヤ・ミトラと話した。グリダニアへ戻り、アプカル滝の「ヤ・ミトラ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_06<tab>Y'mhitra praises you on your triumph once more, and speaks eagerly of revealing the lost knowledge hidden within the tome. Before you can attempt Prin's next challenge, however, it seems you will need to work on perfecting your technique.

※The next summoner quest will be available from Y'mhitra upon reaching level 63.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SEQ_06<tab>ヤ・ミトラと話した。プリンキピアから次の試練を受けるため、さらに召喚士としての力量を高めていこう。

※召喚士のレベルが63以上になると、アプカル滝のヤ・ミトラから次の召喚士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Rammbroes at Saint Coinach's Find.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_00<tab>聖コイナク財団の調査地のラムブルースと話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Y'mhitra at Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_01<tab>レヴナンツトールのヤ・ミトラと話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Principia in north Silvertear and complete the first challenge.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_02<tab>銀泪湖北岸のプリンキピアと話し、敵を討伐

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Y'mhitra in north Silvertear.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_03<tab>銀泪湖北岸のヤ・ミトラと話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Y'mhitra in Gridania.
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_TODO_04<tab>グリダニアのヤ・ミトラと話す

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I've had the most fascinating news. 'Twould seem that the ruins of ancient Allag have yielded to us a tome containing unknown secrets of the summoner's art.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、興味深い報せが入ったわ。
古代アラグ帝国の遺跡から、
召喚魔法について記された書物が見つかったらしいの！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_031<tab>The tome in question is currently being kept under Rammbroes's watchful gaze at our dig site in Mor Dhona. I'll be heading there shortly myself, but I would not begrudge you an earlier peek!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_031<tab>書物は、モードゥナの聖コイナク財団の調査地で、
「ラムブルース」が預かってるそうよ。
私もすぐに行くから、先に向かっていてもらえるかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_040<tab>Still here? I'd have thought the existence of an unknown work on the art of summoning would have had you flying along the currents of aether to Rammbroes's side by now.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_040<tab>書物は、モードゥナの聖コイナク財団の調査地で、
「ラムブルース」が預かってるそうよ。
私もすぐに行くから、先に向かっていてもらえるかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_060<tab>Ah, I thought you might be along. Here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─a prize such as this should be in your keeping.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_060<tab>やあ、待っていたよ。
見つかった「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D6001 /var>」を、まずは渡しておこう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_061<tab>We uncovered it not terribly far from where we excavated the evoker's attire. I've judged the tome to be some manner of manual for summoning magic, but alas, I was unable to decipher the writings. 'Tis fortunate, then, that such a task falls directly within Y'mhitra's field of expertise.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_061<tab>以前、召喚士の装束が出土した場所の近くで発見された。
召喚魔法の教本とみているが、封印が施されていてね。
こうした物品の解読は、ヤ・ミトラの専門だ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_062<tab>Speaking of which, would you mind taking the book to her yourself? She sent word that she had been held up by some dreary business in Revenant's Toll. Pray do be careful!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_062<tab>……その彼女だが、野暮用で足止めを喰っていると連絡があった。
レヴナンツトールにいる「ヤ・ミトラ」に、その本を渡してほしい。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_070<tab>Were you able to find Y'mhitra in town? I can think of no one better suited to unraveling the secrets within that Allagan tome.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_RAMMBROES_000_070<tab>レヴナンツトールにいる「ヤ・ミトラ」に、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D6001 /var>」を渡してほしい。
召喚魔法の教本とみているが、解読は彼女の専門だ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_080<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I sent word that I would meet you in Revenant's Toll. Did Rammbroes not pass along my message?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_080<tab>あら……？
レヴナンツトールで落ちあう約束だと思ったけれど、
ラムブルースから、伝わってなかったのかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_120<tab>My apologies─a trifling but unavoidable matter prevented me from making directly for the dig site. Now, shall we take a closer look at this Allagan tome?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_120<tab>調査地までいっしょに行けなくて、ごめんなさい！
ラムブルースから預かった「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D6001 /var>」を、
見せてもらえるかしら……？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_130<tab>Oh my... 'Tis rather more shabby than what I've come to expect from the great works of Allag, but let's not be discouraged. The content is what truly matters.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_130<tab>この本が、そうなのね……！
アラグの書物としては、ずいぶんみすぼらしいけど……
大切なのは中身よね。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_131<tab>(-???-)A fine observation!
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_131<tab>(-？？？？-)そのとおりでございます！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_132<tab>Principia, at your service. I am a humble familiar, humbly familiar with the doctrine of summoning.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_132<tab>私めは「プリンキピア」。
召喚魔法の教典にして、使い魔でございます。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_133<tab>...Have we awoken a sentient tome from some ancient library? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must keep it contained!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_133<tab>どこかの図書館から逃げだした<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20F4901 /var>かしら？
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……挟み撃ちにするわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_134<tab>Have I somehow given offense? Strange, for I am not equipped with offensive capabilities. Imparting the art of summoning is my function, and instructional manual is my form.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_134<tab>耳を貸すつもりが、まったくありませんね……！？
どうか冷静に……私めは、戦闘機能をそなえておりません。
召喚魔法を後世に伝えるために記された、教本でございますので！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_135<tab>...A manual, you say?
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_135<tab>ん、教本…………教科書ってこと？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_136<tab>Correct. When opened in the presence of summoners, I am bound to awaken and share with them the secrets of summoning. The young <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var> there is in possession of an active soul crystal, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_136<tab>はい、私めの使命は、召喚士の存在を感知したときに目を覚まし、
召喚魔法の秘法を授けること。
そちらの<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((お方)) /var>は、活性化したソウルクリスタルをお持ちですね？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_137<tab>'Twas the soul crystal that awoke you?
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_137<tab>ソウルクリスタルに反応したというの？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_138<tab>Correct. Only one who carries a soul crystal and has bathed in the aether of an eikon may wield the powers of a summoner. I sensed one worthy of instruction, and was thus compelled to introduce myself.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_138<tab>はい、召喚士となることができるのは、
ソウルクリスタルを所持し、かつ闘神のエーテルに触れた者だけ。
条件に合う方を感知したため、話をする機を窺っておりました。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_139<tab>“Eikon”... That is the Allagan word for “primal.” Excuse my need to clarify the obvious, but you are a construct created to teach summoning magicks to any potential student you encounter? Why would the ancients have deemed such a thing necessary?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_139<tab>闘神……アラグにおける蛮神のことね。
つまり召喚士を見つけて、秘法を教えるための本ということ？
いったい何のために……？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_140<tab>Summoning came into being for the purpose of eliminating beings─specifically those beings known as eikons. Ahem, “primals.” Once these entities have all been vanquished, however, new egi cannot be harnessed. Old summoners perish, and so, too, does their art.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_140<tab>召喚魔法は、闘神……いえ、蛮神討滅のために生まれた体系。
しかし蛮神がすべて消え去れば、召喚獣の調伏もできなくなります。
やがて召喚士は絶え、究めた技術も失われる……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_141<tab>It was upon glimpsing this bleak future that a certain master summoner set about crafting yours truly. Inscribed with arts of tremendous power, I exist to teach others how to safeguard their existence.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_141<tab>とある大召喚士が、その未来を見越し、私めを創造したのです。
世界の危機に目を覚まし、大いなる秘法を伝授するために。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_142<tab>Fascinating... Your creation speaks to the heart of the discipline's rarity. Summoning harnesses the power of primals for the sole purpose of destroying them, and new summoners arise only in an age when primals are rife.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_142<tab>驚いたわね……これは召喚魔法の本質にかかわる話よ。
蛮神を滅ぼすために、その力を利用するのが召喚魔法。
召喚士は、蛮神が跋扈（ばっこ）する時代にしか誕生しない。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_143<tab>With the absence of living mentors, a true succession of the art is never achieved. Principia, are you then to instruct <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> in the lost secrets of Allag?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_143<tab>だから召喚魔法は、先人から「継承」することが困難なのよ！
……プリンキピア、あなたは失われたアラグの秘法を、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>に教えてくれるというの？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_144<tab>I am eager to oblige, but there are certain obligations. Ere the seal upon my higher knowledge can be unlocked, the student must first overcome the three challenges I am ensorcelled to present.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_144<tab>はい、ただしそのためには、
私めの課す「3つの試練」を越える必要がございますが……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_145<tab>Well, considering how it refers to primals as “eikons,” I'm inclined to believe that we have an authentic Allagan relic on our hands. What say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Will you undertake these challenges?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_145<tab>蛮神を「闘神」と呼んだことといい、
この子がアラグの書物という話は、どうも本当みたいね。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、試練を受けてみない？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_146<tab>The first challenge is a test of power. This trial is designed to evaluate the raw magnitude of your arcane talent by pitting you against a predetermined opponent of carefully measured fortitude. Also known as “I manifest a monster, and you fight it.”
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_146<tab>第一の試練は「力」の試練。
すべての基本となる、魔法の潜在力を見るものです。
私めが魔法で創りだした怪物と、戦っていただきます。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_147<tab>Ah, mayhap not terribly wise to attempt that in the middle of town. Why don't we find ourselves a less-populated area out near the Singing Shards?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_147<tab>……街なかでは、迷惑になるわね。
「銀泪湖北岸」へ移動しましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_160<tab>Are you prepared for this “test of power”? 'Twould seem Principia is but waiting on your word.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_160<tab>第一の試練……力の試練とやらを始めるわ。
戦う準備ができたら、プリンキピアに声をかけて。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_170<tab>I thought we were headed for north Silvertear? We certainly cannot hold the trial <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_170<tab>第一の試練は、モードゥナの「銀泪湖北岸」よ？
人目がある場所は、避けたいの。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_210<tab>Shall we begin the test of power, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_210<tab>それでは第一の試練こと「力」の試練を始めましょうか、<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((ご主人様)) /var>。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_211<tab>...“<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>”? You treat your pupil as a superior, Principia?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_211<tab>……<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((ご主人様)) /var>？
ずいぶん丁寧な呼び方をするのね、プリンキピア。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_212<tab>Such was the way in which I was written. Ah, and if my full name begins to tire your tongue, you are welcome to call me “Prin” or “Pia.”
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_212<tab>そのような魔紋を施されておりますので……。
それから私めの呼び名でございますが、もしも呼びにくければ、
「プリンク」でかまいません。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_213<tab>Oooh, I rather like “Prin.” Ahem, I mean, let us proceed with the challenge!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_213<tab>そうさせてもらうわ、プリンク。
それじゃ、試練を始めて！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_220<tab>A fine showing, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>. Even the greatest of Allagan summoners would be forced to recognize the extent of your extant power.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_220<tab>みごとでございます、<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((ご主人様)) /var>。
アラグの高位の召喚士にも劣らぬ、大いなる魔力でした……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_270<tab>A crushing victory, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Who could argue the potential of modern summoning after that display?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_270<tab>貫禄勝ちね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……！
現代の召喚士の力を、見せつけてやれたんじゃないかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_280<tab>You have bested the first challenge, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>. There are few summoners in Allag's long history who boasted this degree of native might!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_280<tab>第一の試練は合格です、<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((ご主人様)) /var>。
長いアラグの歴史においても、これほどの「力」を持った召喚士は、
幾人とおりません……！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_281<tab>Furthermore, that you have achieved such potency through naught but the study of ancient wisdom is simply astonishing. With a little polish to your technique, guiding you to loftier heights of power should be astonishingly simple.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_281<tab>しかも、これらの魔法を、
古の知識を紐解くことで身につけたとは、驚嘆に値します。
さらに技術を洗練すれば、その資質はもっと磨かれるでしょう。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_282<tab>I'd thought <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s technique more than sufficiently polished, but you say there is room for improvement? I see we shall have to adjust our yalmstick for perfection if we are to rival the practitioners of the past.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_282<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の技術は、
充分洗練されてると思うけど、まだ伸びしろがあるってこと？
アラグの時代には常識だった作法を、私たちは知らないものね。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_283<tab>Indeed. If you would know more of past practices, then you need only ask.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_283<tab>左様にございます。
よろしければ折をみて、召喚魔法の歴史なども、
講釈させていただきましょう。

source:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_284<tab>Actually, I do have a question for you...
If you would indulge me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_284<tab>だったら、プリンクにいま聞きたいことがあるのだけど……
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、いいかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_100_284<tab>Prin, in which age were you created? You appear to lack the technological advancements that were predominant in constructs in the latter days of Allag's civilization...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_100_284<tab>プリンク、あなたが産み出されたのは、いつごろの時代？
あなたには、アラグ文明後期の特徴である、
「魔科学」が使われた形跡が見られないけれど……。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_285<tab>Another excellent observation. I was penned by Master Sari, a preeminent summoner of his time. He was, in fact, likely the last master summoner of the Allagan Empire's reign.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_285<tab>ヤ・ミトラ様、非常によい着眼点です。
私めを著した偉大な召喚士の名は「サリ」様。
アラグ帝国時代の、おそらくは最後の大召喚士でした。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_286<tab>Were I to date myself by your culture's notion of history, my creation would have taken place at a point just before the empire's collapse. In other words, solidly within the richest era of aetherochemical discovery.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_286<tab>あなた方から伺った歴史にあてはめると、私めが創造されたのは、
アラグ帝国の崩壊寸前……すなわち魔科学の最盛期にあたります。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_100_286<tab>One might reasonably wonder why this wonderful science was excluded from my invention, and I assure you, there is a reason...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_100_286<tab>にもかかわらず、私めに魔科学……
特に「科学」の産物が使用されていない理由ですが……

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_287<tab>In the beginning, the Allagans rose to superiority through their mastery of magecraft. It is told that the very first wielders of summoning magic made do with grimoires fashioned of leather and ink and parchment.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_287<tab>もともとアラグは、「魔法」を究めることで繁栄した文明でした。
そのころ召喚魔法の使い手は、革と紙とインクでできた、
素朴な魔道書を使用していたと聞きます。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_288<tab>There came a tipping point, however, when the mundane sciences began to progress with ever-growing rapidity. These advances were married with the arcane, and aetherochemical technology was born.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_288<tab>ところが、ある時を境に、急速に科学技術が発達。
魔法と科学を融合した「魔科学」が隆盛を迎えたのです。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_289<tab>Even as the harnessing of lightning energies gave rise to new recording mediums, techniques were developed that allowed complex arcane geometries to be instantly plotted. Traditional grimoires were replaced by devastatingly efficient and elegant weapons.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_289<tab>雷子を利用した新たな記録媒体が生まれ、
さらには複雑な魔紋を、一瞬で構築する技術が発展し、
魔道書も、武器として洗練されていきました。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_290<tab>The convenience of these tools, however, did not lend themselves well to the instruction of initiates. Beyond such considerations, the new mediums could not be perused without dedicated machinery, and their manufacture was no simple matter.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_290<tab>ただ、こうした便利な道具は、術者の育成には不向きです。
また新たな記憶媒体は、特別な機械なしには読み取れず、
製造も容易ではありません。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_291<tab>...And so the summoner who breathed life into you decided that tomestones and the like were not the ideal method for passing on his accumulated wisdom.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_291<tab>それでわかったわ……プリンクに命をあたえた人は、
アラガントームストーンのような記録媒体は、
後世に召喚魔法を遺すには向かない、と考えたのね。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_292<tab>Correct. He chose for me the primitive form of a book, and inscribed within my pages a bounty of potent incantations that required no machine to be cast.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_292<tab>はい、そのとおりです。
ですから私めを、原始的な本のかたちで著し、
機械に頼らずとも発動できる、強力な秘法を記したのです。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_293<tab>Thank you, Prin. I thought only to satisfy my academic curiosity, but I found myself swept up in your description of the past. ...You truly are the creation of an incredible age.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_293<tab>ありがとう、学術的な興味から質問したのだけれど、
なかなか面白い話が聞けたわ。
……あなたは本当に、アラグの時代を生きた本なのね。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_294<tab>And thank you for your patience, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Shall we return to Gridania?
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_294<tab>つきあってくれてありがとう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
それじゃ、グリダニアへ戻るわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_330<tab>Welcome home, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>. Or should that be, “welcome back”? I am told this is the base of your research efforts with Lady Y'mhitra, but I am unsure of the correct salutation.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_PRINCIPIA_000_330<tab>おかえりなさいませ、<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((ご主人様)) /var>。
こちらが<var 08 E905 ((お嬢様)) ((ご主人様)) /var>とヤ・ミトラ様の、
共同研究の拠点と伺っております。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_DANCINGWOLF_000_340<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you've been well I trust? I'm trying to bend Y'mhitra's ear, but she seems a little distracted.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_DANCINGWOLF_000_340<tab>元気にやってたか？
いまちょっと、ヤ・ミトラの嬢ちゃんを口説いてるとこなんだ。
いやいや、変な意味じゃなくて、仕事の話だぞ？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_DANCINGWOLF_000_341<tab>...Not that I can blame her. Have you seen this hopping book? I'm fairly sure I caught a flash of teeth in between those pages...
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_DANCINGWOLF_000_341<tab>それはさておき……そこの、ヤバそうな本は何だ！？
使い魔だって聞いたが、ほんとに噛みついたりしないんだろうな？

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_360<tab>Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We are one step closer to revealing a new secret of ancient Allag!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_360<tab>第一の試練、おつかれさま！
3つの試練に打ち勝って、アラグの秘法をものにしましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_361<tab>Prin will issue the next challenge after you've had the chance to review your studies, and hone your abilities to a new level of perfection.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_361<tab>機が熟したら、プリンクが次の試練を課すそうよ。
それまでの間、より強く、より正確に術を繰りだせるよう、
腕前を磨いておくのがいいと思うわ。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_362<tab>...I've decided to keep the familiar here at my side for the moment. Even with as many wonders as Eorzea holds, folk tend to panic at the sight of a fanged tome that jumps around of its own accord.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_362<tab>……プリンクは、私がここで預かっておこうと思うの。
この姿であちこち連れまわすのは、ちょっと問題ありそうだしね。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_363<tab>Oh, and pay no mind to Captain Wolf. He obviously wishes to secure my services for some task or another, but we have more important matters to attend to!
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_YMHITRA_000_363<tab>あ、隣のダンシング・ウルフ大闘士のことは気にしないで。
頼みがあるらしいんだけど、こっちはそれどころじゃないんだから！

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>The next summoner quest will be available from Y'mhitra upon reaching level 63.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>「召喚士」の新たなジョブクエストが開始されました。
次のクエストは「レベル63」以上で、
アプカル滝のヤ・ミトラから受注可能です。

source: TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SYSTEM_000_901<tab>The requirements for undertaking subsequent quests can be reviewed in your journal.
target:
TEXT_JOBSMN601_02625_SYSTEM_000_901<tab>今後の「召喚士」のジョブクエスト受注条件は、
コンプリート後のジャーナルで確認できます。
